successes.title: ZEROHOUR RELIC XR: Tactical USB Battery Backup Flashlight
successes.description: Micro-USB rechargeable tactical flashlight with 3400mAh USB battery backup. Charges Android & iPhone. Bike & weapon mountable.

Pledges.description: RELIC Flashlight Only, Battery NOT Included (Micro-USB cable, Paracord Keychain, Carrying bag)
EARLY BIRDS: ZEROHOUR RELIC XR (Flashlight, 3400mAh 18650 battery, Micro-USB cable, Paracord Keychain, Carrying bag)
